STP.TXT: Do You want to close this windows ?

ExpSyntax.val: NOT ISNULL({0,126}) AND NOT {0,366} AND LastClicked()<>'CloseWindow'
MlsTrans('The field is required to fill')
MlsTrans('The field is required to fill')
MlsTrans('Date do not lay between the current date')

Text.val: Buat LOV PO di Program ini range Cardcode di header dan Status O. BaseEntry jg di update sesuai OPOR.DocEntry
BaseLine Buat Combo saja dair POR1.
-- Read First before update virtual variables

ExpSyntax.val: NOT ISNULL({0,137}) AND Stat(0,'C'MODE) AND (ISNULL({0,121}) OR Trim({0,121})='')
MlsTrans('BL Qty must less than Order. Please refer to BL Qty (Top Right) of this form')
MlsTrans('Are you sure to delete this data?')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select h.DocEntry, h.DocNum, h.DocType, h.DocDate, h.DocStatus, h.CardCode, h.U_IDU_Kode_PT, h.CardName, h.DocDueDate, h.Comments, h.DocTotal, p.PrcName, d.TotalBLQty from opor h (nolock) left join ( select DocEntry, SUM(PcQuantity) as TotalBLQty from por1 group by DocEntry ) d on h.DocEntry = d.DocEntry left join oprc p (nolock) on h.U_IDU_Kode_PT = p.PrcCode where DocType = 'I' and DocStatus = 'O' and DocDate <= ':1' and CardCode = ':2' and U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':3'
select count(0) from OPBL where NumAtCard = ':1' and DocDate between ':2' and ':3' and CANCELED = 'N'
select count(0) from "@OPDL" where U_IDU_BL = ':1' and U_IDU_BillDate between ':2' and ':3' and CANCELED = 'N'
SELECT DISTINCT DOCENTRY,BASETYPE,BASEENTRY FROM PBL1 where docentry=:1
